id: Notion Task Manager (with Eisenhower Matrix and Kanban Board)
name: Notion Task Manager (with Eisenhower Matrix and Kanban Board)
description: Hello Notion-Lovers, enjoy this free-to-use Task Manager! The center of this template is a database for all of your tasks that can be displayed in the following ways: Eisenhower Matrix -> Prioritise your tasks by importance and urgencyKanban Board -> Visually arrange and track your task-workflow by categorising its stage of progress.Calendar View -> Keep on top of all your upcoming deadlines. Further more you can use a pre-built template for your new tasks that include a guide on how to
features: Eisenhower Matrix-> Prioritise your tasks by importance and urgency; Kanban Board-> Visually arrange and track your task-workflow by categorising its stage of progress.; Calendar View-> Keep on top of all your upcoming deadlines.
